price: 6. Qofyahow! Waad dhibtoon kuna jiri dhib iyo howl ilaa (ay kuu timaaddo geeri), waadna la kulmi (natiijada camalkaaga khayr ama shar wuxuu yahayba Maalinta Qiyaamaha).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدۡحٗا فَمُلَٰقِيهِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan famulāqīhi
